 2010-13772010-11-04,  CITIZENSHIP,  ,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to make changes related to humanitarian and compassionate (H&C) considerations. The objective is to maintain the status quo by ensuring that applicants who are granted positive humanitarian and compassionate consideration on the Ministerâ€™s initiative or positive consideration on public policy grounds continue to be covered by the Regulations following the Royal Assent of Bill C-11 (Balanced Refugee Reform Act).
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0252 Publication Date: 2010-11-24
